channel.title: RealmScape server is Recruited coder and scripter
channel.description:
Hi all Rs Lover,
Iam the Admin of Realmscape Today i want to open my serevr but before i open i need alot of help
Been download all Stuff no i need This following
1.Server on/ Off Scripter ( i neeed couple scripter) 2.Rs Scripter( must know how to make a script for Rs) 3.Coder( Rs Coder i need Couple) 4.Rs Web/Forum Designer 5.Couple Moderator to keep the Server Safe 6. Report System Scripter ( i need to get it fully working) Server Feature: Admin & Moderator Village ( I need good coder To make it) Include Custom Npc that sell cool item ( for Amin and gm)
Alot more Custom stuff will add asap
Sign up Here
Forum name: Do you ever work for Other Rs Server? What your Experience? Example of your work? What Kind of work you want to Do? What can you do to Improve the server?
